alert.note: Alert for Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 21 at 9:01PM EST until December 22 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will likely blow down scattered trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are possible. Loose outdoor objects may be blown away or damaged.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
